homepage.teams_title: Helping teams around the world deliver winning products
homepage.teams_subtitle: 20+ years building websites, apps, interactive installations and digital products for art and education institutions, governments, start-ups, SMEs and multinational corporations
homepage.slide1_subtitle: Maximizing the lifespan of your investment is a top priority and KPI
homepage.slide1_block1_body: Leveraging the power of custom and tiny NodeJs Static Site Generators or big JavaScript SSR SSGs like Gatsby or Nextjs to deliver professional, ultra-fast, mobile-first websites that last longer and are cheaper and safer to maintain
homepage.slide1_block2_body: Building multi-language SEO friendly JAM Stack SPAs and PWAs with pre-rendering, TypeScript, React (Native), CSS-in-JS and Cypress to maximize robustness, scalability and maintainability
homepage.slide1_block3_body: Coding Style Guidelines. Github repositories. CI with Semaphore. Serverless Functions. Netlify hosting. Clean code with Prettier and Eslint. Error reporting with Sentry. Staging and Pilot environments. Postmortems. Security audits
homepage.slide1_block4_body: Fast & flexible implementations with Roadmaps, Scrum, Kanban and sprints to avoid scope creep. Semantic Releases and extreme documentation with a single source of truth
homepage.slide2_title: Consistent and user-centered UI UX design
homepage.slide2_subtitle: When finesse and attention to detail align with easy user journeys and natural interfaces, the magic happens
homepage.slide2_block1_body: Before and after building the tech, every product has to be validated by potential users and their feedback taken onboard. This will save you time and money
homepage.slide2_block2_body: It's mandatory for every organization to maintaining the Design Consistency, Brand Guidelines and reusable, accessible and themable components across all its products with the help of Figma and Storybook
homepage.slide2_block3_body: Standing-out from the crowd and connecting deeply with your users lie on the ability to provide delightful, emotional or gamified experiences
homepage.slide2_block4_body: Logos, landing pages, multimedia presentations, sales or pitch decks, documentation sites, banners and video production
homepage.slide3_title: Data and Content Management that scales
homepage.slide3_subtitle: Keeping your data and your customers' data safe, well organized and easy to update
homepage.slide3_block1_body: Whether your organization prefers StoryBlok, Contentful, Strapi, Directus, Ghost or markdown files, the recommendation is to keep the content detached from your front-end
homepage.slide3_block2_body: Custom REST or GraphQL API implementation using NodeJs and Express web server. Database and ORM integration with Prisma, MongoDB, PostgreSQL or MySQL
homepage.slide3_block3_body: BaaS (like Firebase), FaaS, IaaS, PaaS, whichever model or vendor (AWS, Google) your organization needs to use for your SaaS product
homepage.slide3_block4_body: Caching with Redis for apps with high-traffic
